song.full_title: Baby Can I Hold You by Boyzone
song.title: Baby Can I Hold You
song.lyrics:
Baby Can I Hold You Lyrics[Verse 1]
"Sorry", is all that you can't say
Years gone by and still
Words don't come easily
Like "sorry" (like "sorry", like "sorry")

[Verse 2]
"Forgive me", is all that you can't say
Years gone by and still
Words don't come easily
Like "forgive me" ("forgive me") Forgive me
[Chorus]
But you can say, baby
Baby, can I hold you tonight?
Baby, if I told you the right words
Oooh, at the right time
You'll be mine

[Verse 3]
"I love you", is all that you can't say
Years gone by and still
Words don't come easily
(Words don't come easily)
Like "I love you", "I love you"

[Chorus]
But you can say, baby
Baby, can I hold you tonight?
Baby, if I told you the right words
Oooh, at the right time
You'll be mine

[Outro]
(Baby, can I hold you)
Baby, can I hold you tonight?
Baby, if I told you the right words
Oooh, at the right time
You'll be mine
(Baby, if I told you)
(Baby, can I hold you) You'll be mine
(Baby, if I told you)
(Baby, can I hold you) You'll be mine
(Baby, if I told you)
